TITLE: Basic Svelte Toast Implementation DESCRIPTION: Basic example showing how to set up the Toaster component and create a toast SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: svelte CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Promise-based Toast DESCRIPTION: Example of a toast that handles promise states with loading, success, and error messages SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` toast.promise(() => new Promise((resolve) => setTimeout(resolve, 2000)), { loading: 'Loading', success: 'Success', error: 'Error' }); ``` LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` toast.promise(promise, { loading: 'Loading...', success: (data) => { return `${data.name} has been added!`; }, error: 'Error' }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Toast with Action Button DESCRIPTION: Implementation of a toast with an action button that can trigger a callback SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` toast('Event has been created', { action: { label: 'Undo', onClick: () => console.log('Undo') } }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Headless Toast Component DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a custom unstyled toast component with close functionality SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: svelte CODE: ```
This is a custom component
``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Custom Toast with Icon DESCRIPTION: Example of creating a toast with a custom icon and description SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: javascript CODE: ``` import Icon from './Icon.svelte'; toast('Event has been created', { description: 'Monday, January 3rd at 6:00pm', icon: Icon }); ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Tailwind CSS Toast Styling DESCRIPTION: Example of styling toasts using Tailwind CSS classes with the unstyled option SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_6 LANGUAGE: svelte CODE: ``` ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Installing svelte-sonner Package DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the svelte-sonner package using different package managers SOURCE: https://github.com/wobsoriano/svelte-sonner/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-17_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: bash CODE: ``` npm i svelte-sonner # or yarn add svelte-sonner # or pnpm add svelte-sonner ```
